alerts.headline: squall watch ended
alerts.description:
Squalls are no longer expected over the area.


###

alerts.headline: severe thunderstorm watch ended
alerts.description:
Conditions are no longer favourable for the development of severe thunderstorms.


###

affected_areas.area_description: Ear Falls - Perrault Falls - Western Lac Seul

alerts.headline: squall watch in effect
alerts.description:
Conditions are favourable for the development of squalls with wind gusts up to 35 knots this afternoon into this evening.

###

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. For more information monitor Canadian Coast Guard radio or Weatheradio stations.
alerts.instruction: Mariners are advised to prepare for potential squalls. Vulnerable vessels are most at risk and should seek safe harbour if underway. Consider delaying or postponing travel in areas under the Squall Watch.

alerts.headline: squall warning in effect
alerts.description:
Squalls with wind gusts up to 35 knots, frequent lightning and poor to very poor visibility in thunderstorms heavy at times are expected or occurring in the area.

Thunderstorms moving northeast from Upper Michgan will affect the waters from Wawa and south this evening.

###

Poor to very poor visibility may contribute to voyage delays and make marine navigation hazardous.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. For more information monitor Canadian Coast Guard radio or Weatheradio stations.
alerts.instruction: Vessels without lightning protection should make their way to shore immediately.
